section.name: HL7 over HTTP - Relay
section.p: HAPI HL7 over HTTP (HoH) relay is a standalone and self-contained software package which can be used to bridge the gap between applications which support HoH, and those that do not.
To get started with the HoH relay:

ul.li: First, read about Installing HoH relay
Then, read about Configuring HoH relay
